name: toma-doggy
description: This application delivers the user the experience of taking care of a virtual pet. The design is purposefully simplistic and pixelated, conjuring memories of our application's namesake, the Tamagotchi. This user is able to create an account on our application, select a pet, and interact with their pet in order to keep it happy!    ## Table of Contents    * [Deployed Application](#deployed-application)   * [Screenshots](#screenshots)   * [Installation](#installation)   * [Usage](#usage)   * [Contributors](#contributors)   * [Tests](#tests)   * [License](#license)   * [Questions](#questions)   ## Deployed Application
